item.title: Solana Ecosystem Token Launchpad AOL Experiences Over 50% Temporary Dip, WLFI Partnership on Hold For Now
item.description: On September 1st, based on GMGN market data, the token launchpad America.Fun (AOL) in the Solana ecosystem witnessed a short-term plunge of more than 50%, with a current market value of 11.83 million US dollars.Before this, the community believed that the platform was a partner of USD1 in the Solana ecosystem. However, AOL did not appear in the latest WLFI announcement.

item.title: Gate Launchpool GUSD Staking Pool Annualized Yield is currently at 8.63%
item.description: On September 1st, based on the latest official figures, the reference annualized yield of Gate's 304th Launchpool GUSD Staking Pool is 8.63%. Users can engage in yield generation by staking GUSD.GUSD is a digital asset backed by real-world assets (RWA) such as U.S. Treasury bonds, offering users a lower-risk and more stable return asset allocation option. Gate has fully enabled trading, deposits, withdrawals, and related financial functions, enabling users to mint GUSD at a 1:1 ratio with USDT or USDC. The current total minted GUSD is 12.435 million, with a reference annualized yield of 4.4%.

item.title: WLFI Top Gainer closed a 3x long position and switched to an 8x long position on TRUMP coin
item.description: On September 1st, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, the leading profit taker on WLFI liquidated his 3x leveraged long position, reaping a profit of $915,000. Additionally, he opened a TRUMP long position with an 8x leverage.

item.title: The Bonk team has confirmed that Freya will become the Bonk ecosystem's USD1 trading pair on the ICM protocol, and will receive support from Solana's ecosystem core contributors.
item.description: On September 1st, the Bonk team announced that Freya will become the USD1 trading pair ICM (Internet Capital Market) protocol within the Bonk ecosystem, with the support of Bonk and Solana ecosystem core contributors.The day before, founder Natsuki attended the Japan Solana ecosystem conference SuperTokyo and initially revealed the evolution from a single ICM flywheel to the ICM protocol Freya Protocol. It also received support from ecosystem core contributors such as Jupiter, Bonk, Jito, Backpack, Metaplex, Superteam, and the Solana Foundation.

item.title: Bithumb will list the WLFI/KRW trading pair
item.description: On September 1st, according to official information, Bithumb is going to list the WLFI/KRW trading pair, and the start time of trading will be determined.

item.title: Opinion: This Week's Employment Data Will Further Confirm the Fed's Rate-Cutting Trend
item.description: On September 1st, which is this Friday, the US will release the August seasonally adjusted non-farm payroll report. A survey of top economists by The Wall Street Journal indicates that the expected job creation for last month is merely 75,000, and the unemployment rate may rise from 4.2% to 4.3%, reaching a nearly four-year high.Bill Adams, the Chief Economist at U.S. Bank, stated that for the financial markets, the most favorable situation is for the upcoming employment report to show moderate job growth and a slight increase in the unemployment rate. This would suggest that the economy is not in a recession but also demonstrate sufficient labor market softness to justify the Fed's rate cut.On the contrary, the most unfavorable situation is if the employment report shows a decrease in the number of jobs, a drop in the labor force participation rate, and a decline in the unemployment rate. This would mean a reduction in labor supply while labor demand is also weakening, presenting

item.title: BONK.fun: We are thrilled to announce that we are the official Launchpad on Solana for USD1, stay tuned for partnership details.
item.description: On September 1st, BONK.fun, a token launch platform within the Solana ecosystem, announced with pride that it has been honored to serve as the official launchpad on Solana for projects with a valuation of USD1. Further details regarding the launch and the significance of this collaboration will be made public shortly.

item.title: Spot Gold Hits New High Since April 22, Intraday Gain Reaches 0.93%
item.description: On September 1st, the spot gold price surged to $3480 per ounce, reaching a new high since April 22nd. It recorded a daily gain of 0.93%. (Oriental Fortune Network)

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: Escalation of Middle East and Russia-Ukraine Tensions Suppresses Risk Appetite for BTC, Pressure at 111.6k/113.6k, Support at 107.4k
item.description: On September 1st, Israel announced the killing of a key Hamas spokesperson in Gaza City and is gearing up for a full-scale attack on Gaza. Meanwhile, leaked plans for U.S. post-war intervention and reconstruction have come to light, including a minimum ten-year control strategy. This is happening in parallel with Israel's considerations of annexing the West Bank, leading to a short-term escalation of geopolitical tensions. Both Russia and Ukraine have intensified their attacks on energy infrastructure. Global risk premiums and energy price fluctuations have become the focus of the market. In the cryptocurrency space, a significant amount of BTC liquidations in the past week have been concentrated around 109.5k. The level of 107.4k below is a concentration of long positions. The price is currently oscillating between 108k and 110k.Bitunix Analyst Suggestion: This event has brought international relations, humanitarian issues, and sovereignty to the forefront, which may increase short-

item.title: WLFI: USD1 Officially Launches on Solana and Integrates with Raydium, BONK.fun, and Kamino
item.description: On September 1st, it was announced that 1 USD is backed 1:1 by reserve assets and was integrated on its first day on Solana along with Raydium, BONK.fun, and Kamino.
